Terragon Group Ltd bụ ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ Naijiria nke na-eji data na nnyocha enyere ụlọ ọrụ aka ịre ngwaahịa ha n'Africa
Elo Umeh na Ayodeji Balogun guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 2009 ma nwee isi ụlọ ọrụ na Lagos, Nigeria na ọrụ na Kenya, Ghana, South Africa na India.
N'afọ 2015, Terragon Group wepụtara ngwa mkpanaka mgbasa ozi mbụ n'Africa nke a na-akpọ "Adrenaline" nke na-enye ndị mgbasa ozi ohere ịzụta ngwongwo na ịmepụta ọwa na ndị ahịa nwere ike.
N'ọnwa Eprel 2018, Terragon nwetara nde dọla ise site na TLcom Capital. N'ọnwa Nọvemba 2018, otu Terragon nwetara Bizense.
N'afọ 2021, Terragon ghọrọ ụlọ ọrụ Afrịka mbụ banyere na ndepụta nke ụlọ ọrụ data ndị ahịa (CDP).
